name: spotify-playlist-manager
description: Spotify Playlist Manager with brand-based playlist creation

scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo '=== PREBUILD START ===' && pwd && ls -la && cd frontend && npm install && echo '=== PREBUILD END ==='
scripts.heroku-postbuild: bash -c 'echo === POSTBUILD START === && pwd && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd) && cd frontend && npm run build && echo === BUILD COMPLETED === && ls -la build/ && echo === COPYING FILES === && rm -rf $ROOT_DIR/backend/static/* && mkdir -p $ROOT_DIR/backend/static && cp -rv build/* $ROOT_DIR/backend/static/ && echo === COPY COMPLETED === && ls -la $ROOT_DIR/backend/static/'
scripts.start: cd backend && STATIC_DIR=/app/backend/static PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:. gunicorn main:app --workers 4 --worker-class uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker
